Package library

Class Library

java.lang.Object
library.Library
public class Library
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Library()
    Default constructor to create an empty bag data structure.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void add​(Book book)
    Adds a book to the library's array of books.
    boolean checkOut​(Book book)
    Checks out a book from the library.
    private int find​(Book book)
    Helper method to find a book in the bag.
    private int findEndOfArray​(Book[] books)
    Helper method to find the end of the array.
    private void grow()
    Helper method to grow the capacity by 4.
    void print()
    Prints the list of books in the bag/library's catalog.
    void printByDate()
    Prints the list of books by datePublished in ascending order contained in the bag/library's catalog
    void printByNumber()
    Prints the list of books by number in ascending order contained in the bag/library's catalog
    boolean remove​(Book book)
    Removes a book from the library's array of books.
    boolean returns​(Book book)
    Returns a book to the library.
    private void selectionSort​(int sortBy)
    Implements selection sorting for two different purposes: sort by date and sort by book serial number.
    private void shift​(int start)
    Helper method to shift all items of an array begin at index start to the end of the array back by 1

  • Constructor Details

    • Library

      public Library()
      Default constructor to create an empty bag data structure.

  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find​(Book book)
      Helper method to find a book in the bag.
      Parameters:
      book - object to find
      Returns:
      index of the book to find, -1 if book can not be found

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Helper method to grow the capacity by 4.

    • add

      public void add​(Book book)
      Adds a book to the library's array of books. If the array of books is already full, then calls the grow method to increase capacity.
      Parameters:
      book - to be added

    • findEndOfArray

      private int findEndOfArray​(Book[] books)
      Helper method to find the end of the array.
      Returns:
      the index of the first empty location in the array, -1 if there is no empty location

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(Book book)
      Removes a book from the library's array of books. Calls shift method to shift back all the books by one
      Parameters:
      book - to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the book was able to be removed, false otherwise

    • shift

      private void shift​(int start)
      Helper method to shift all items of an array begin at index start to the end of the array back by 1

    • checkOut

      public boolean checkOut​(Book book)
      Checks out a book from the library.
      Parameters:
      book - to be checked out
      Returns:
      true if the book was able to be checked out, false otherwise

    • returns

      public boolean returns​(Book book)
      Returns a book to the library.
      Parameters:
      book - to be returned
      Returns:
      true if able to be returned, false otherwise

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints the list of books in the bag/library's catalog. Prints the list of books with the current sequence.

    • selectionSort

      private void selectionSort​(int sortBy)
      Implements selection sorting for two different purposes: sort by date and sort by book serial number.

    • printByDate

      public void printByDate()
      Prints the list of books by datePublished in ascending order contained in the bag/library's catalog

    • printByNumber

      public void printByNumber()
      Prints the list of books by number in ascending order contained in the bag/library's catalog
